title: Medieval Dungeon Adventure #26
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Dark Dungeon Cell
rooms.description: A damp stone cell lit by a single flickering torch. The walls are covered in moss and ancient scratches. Chains hang from the ceiling, and the air smells of mildew and despair. A heavy wooden door with iron bands is the only exit. Water drips steadily from cracks in the ceiling.

items.name: pile of moldy straw
items.description: A heap of old straw in the corner, damp and rotting

items.name: long rusty nail
items.description: A bent iron nail, still sharp enough to be useful

items.name: scratches on wall
items.description: Deep scratches carved into the stone wall by previous prisoners
items.text: Carved message: 'The guard's name is Sir Aldric. He keeps his keys in the chest. The combination is the year the Black Plague came to our land: 1348.'

items.name: old wooden bucket
items.description: A bucket with a loose bottom board

items.name: torn parchment
items.description: A note hidden by a former prisoner
items.text: If you find this, know that freedom lies beyond the guard room. The torture chamber holds the final key. Remember: the dungeon is beneath the castle keep, and only the king's justice can free you.

items.name: locked iron chest
items.description: A small chest bolted to the floor with a combination lock

items.name: heavy iron key
items.description: A large key with the guard's seal stamped on it

items.name: iron banded cell door
items.description: A thick wooden door reinforced with iron bands and a heavy lock

rooms.name: Dungeon Guard Room
rooms.description: A circular chamber with weapon racks on the walls and a large wooden table in the center. Torches burn in iron sconces, casting dancing shadows. A guard's armor stands in the corner, and various instruments of interrogation hang from hooks. The vault door to the east leads to the treasure room and freedom beyond.

items.name: wooden weapon rack
items.description: A rack holding rusty swords and spears

items.name: small bronze key
items.description: A delicate key with ornate engravings

items.name: guard's wooden table
items.description: A sturdy table covered with maps, dice, and ale mugs. It has two drawers.

items.name: guard duty roster
items.description: A schedule listing the guards and their posts
items.text: Guard Roster: Sir Aldric - Dungeon Master. Sir Gareth - Gate Captain. Sir Brennan - Tower Watch. Note: All guards report to Captain Sir Gareth at the castle keep.

items.name: sealed captain's orders
items.description: Official orders from the captain of the guard
items.text: By order of Captain Sir Gareth: The vault contains the king's justice - a royal pardon for the worthy. Only those who can answer may pass: Who commands the dungeon? Where is the dungeon located? What grants freedom?

items.name: suit of guard armor
items.description: A complete set of chainmail and plate armor on a wooden stand

items.name: dungeon layout map
items.description: A detailed map of the dungeon complex
items.text: Map shows: Dungeon cells in the lower level beneath the castle keep. Guard room in the center. Vault and exit passage to the east leading to freedom.

items.name: rack of torture tools
items.description: Various medieval interrogation implements hanging on the wall

items.name: massive iron vault door
items.description: An enormous iron door with a complex locking mechanism. Three questions are engraved on a brass plate.

password_questions.question: Who commands the dungeon?
password_questions.hint: Check the duty roster to see who is the Dungeon Master

password_questions.question: Where is the dungeon located?
password_questions.hint: The dungeon map shows the location

password_questions.question: What grants freedom?
password_questions.hint: The captain's orders mention what the vault contains

rooms.name: Castle Courtyard
rooms.description: You emerge into the bright sunlight of the castle courtyard! Fresh air fills your lungs as you step out of the darkness. Guards lower their weapons as you present the royal pardon from the vault. Birds sing overhead, and the castle gates stand open before you. You are free!

items.name: royal pardon scroll
items.description: An official document bearing the king's seal, granting you freedom and clearing your name

items.name: open castle gates
items.description: The massive wooden gates stand open, leading to the road beyond and your new life of freedom

rooms.win_message: You have escaped the medieval dungeon! With the royal pardon in hand, you walk through the castle gates as a free person. The guards salute you as you pass. Your imprisonment is over, and a new chapter of your life begins. You win!
